ValidationRule.description: When "Product" = "myStaffingPro", please make "Category 1", "Category 2", "Category 3", and "Category 4" required fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Product__c ,'myStaffingPro'), RecordTypeId ='01270000000ULbL', NOT( BEGINS( LOWER(TEXT(Origin)) , "email-to-case")) , NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(MSP_Client_Type__c,"")), OR( ISPICKVAL( Category_1__c ,""),ISPICKVAL( Category_2__c ,""),ISPICKVAL( Category_3__c ,""),ISPICKVAL( Category_4__c ,"")))
